( https://www.make.com/en/blog/make-ai-agents?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+4%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )Hot News: Make AI Agents are here! 🔥

 

Make AI Agents bring real-time decision-making superpowers to your scenarios - based on your goals, in your words. No rigid rules. No manual inputs. Just smart, flexible workflows that think for themselves. Now in beta on all paid plans. Ready to dive in?

Explore Make AI Agents ➜ ( https://www.make.com/en/blog/make-ai-agents?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+4%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )

 

( https://www.make.com/en/use-cases/build-ai-agents?utm_campaign=Make+Updates+4%2F2025&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customer.io )Tutorial: Build your first AI Agent

 

Want to try it yourself? Learn to create an AI Agent from scratch, connect it to your tools, and watch it evolve in real time. Customize its behavior, automate decisions, and build workflows that truly think for you!
